about.title: About Us
about.description: Qutabxana N1 is one of the restaurants that prepares the most delicious qutabs in Azerbaijan. We use fresh and quality products to provide the best service to our customers. Each qutab is prepared with love and care.
about.mission_text: To present traditional Azerbaijani cuisine in a modern style and provide every customer with a pleasant taste and experience. We use only the highest quality and freshest ingredients, and each qutab is prepared with love and care. Our recipes combine traditional methods passed down through generations with modern culinary techniques. Our goal is not just to serve food, but to provide every visitor with an unforgettable culinary journey.

contact.title: Contact Us
